attributes.action: Prevent all MP's from using parliamentary priviledge to avoid prosecution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs using parliamentary privilege in a bid to avoid prosecution for expenses abuses is disgusting. We should campaign to get the Law changed and not have to wait until David Cameron becomes Prime Minister, which he will if Gordon Brown doesn't introduce some radical changes.This has gone on long enough and it's time that MP's accepted that they are not above the Law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
